name: Pet Pilfer
description:
A game born out of the idea of a boy trying to get as many animals as possible, Pet Pilfer's main objective is to get all of the animals in the pet store out the shop.

The more animals you get, the slower you are! This can prove hazardous with heavy security roaming around. 

Controls:

"w" or Up Arrow - Move Up

"a" or Left Arrow - Move Left

"s" or down arrow - Move Down

"d" or right arrow - Move Right

This game is a 2-week rapid prototype with a team of 5.
